level.text: Subject to § 29-1011.03, the person shall have no further rights as a member; and

Subject to § 29-1011.03, subchapter XV of this chapter, and Chapter 2 of this title, any financial rights owned by the person in the person's capacity as a member immediately before dissociation shall be owned by the person as a transferee.

A person's dissociation as a member shall not of itself discharge the person from any debt, obligation, or liability to the limited cooperative association which the person incurred under the organic rules, by contract, or by other means while a member.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

level.heading: Uniform Law:
level.text: This section is based on § 1102 of the Uniform Limited Cooperative Association Act . See Vol. 6A , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.
